page.title: 07Education.
page.content: There are 2 primary schools in the area.St. Chad's C.E. Controlled in Gladstone St.which was opened in Oct. 1909.Most of the 210 pupils on roll live near to the school, the majority from the Dene Estate. The Darnhall Co. Primary School is split between 2 separate sites.The most modern site (1968) is in Sandyhill Rd., while in Darnhall School Lane is the second school built in 1818 and enlarged in 1911 and currently used by children below 7 years of age.The original school founded at Darnhall Knobs in 1699 hs long since disappeared.At present there are 340 children on roll,who live in almost equal ;proportions on the Glebe Green and Swanlow Lane estates.At 11 years the pupils of both schools transfer to one of 2 local comprehensive schools.
